entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CLSCompliant(true) check for arrays as attribute arguments triggers on internal types #68526
  • Setting Naming rules for C# Text editor using Intellisense #68519
  • rework the type hierarchy window #68518
  • Wish Manual Sort Function In DocumentOutLine View #68517
  • Set default sort options for Document Outline #68516
  • Have CodeLens References Window Use Find-All-References window instead #68515
  • ctor code snippset doesn't work after 17.4.0 preview 5.0 update #68514
  • Collapse to definitions ( CTRL + M + O ) should collapse local functions #68513
  • Review DeclaringSyntaxReferences and IsImplicitlyDeclared values for synthesized record members #68510
    17.7

Closed

  • C# 11 required properties do not compile on dotnet 6 #68478
    17.7
  • Compiler fails to detect a constructed `file` type. #67208
    17.7
  • Rename variable (Ctrl+R, Ctrl+R) renames also mentions in XML comments from other methods #68520
  • async/await Visual Studio autocomplete #68512
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Expose FilterSpan/FilterTree public API on remaining analysis contexts #68033
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Telemetry Package version to 17.7.47 #68528
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Don't report CLS compliance warnings for attributes on inacessible types #68527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68524
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove CPD attribute on DiaSymReader dependency #68523
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add 'priority' concept to our code actions, and code refactoring/fix providers. #68511
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure adequate SemanticModel coverage for inline arrays. #68509
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Semantic snippets - `for` and `forr` snippets #68508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement IOperation support for `foreach` over an inline array. #68506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Update language server publishing #68504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix HasFileLocalTypes check for constructed types #68386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Prevent Uri/char[] allocs in RoslynErrorTag.Equals #68525
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in outlining in pathlogical files #68522
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid UI state manipulation on background thread #68507
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merges/main to features/interceptors #68521
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add assertions for shape of possibly intercepted call #68447
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Update our 'delay until visible' logic to not throw cancellation exceptions #68382
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Adds workarounds for Project System bugs in VS Code and a missing des… #68500
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics, Next
  • Remove duplicate NPM publishing step #68505
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Skip checks for overridden or hidden members in overload resolution with extension methods #68316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add more interceptors tests #68462
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add design for interceptors with nonzero arity #68218
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid cancellation exceptions in async queue implementation #68412
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extract a common helper for adding/getting private implementation class methods. #68502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle folders in source-generated file paths #68494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
